name: fingerprint-DNANexus-applet
title: fingerprint
summary: Calculates a unique 'fingerprint' from Illumina methylation or sequencing data using major/minor allele fractions from highly variable SNPs in the human genome.

inputSpec.name: input
inputSpec.help: For sequencing data, provide a .bam file. For methylation, provide an .idat file (either green or red).

inputSpec.name: secondary_input
inputSpec.help: For sequencing data, provide the corresponding .bai file. For methylation, provide the other .idat file.

inputSpec.name: snp_set
inputSpec.help: Set of SNPs to consider for fingerprinting.

inputSpec.name: name
inputSpec.help: Name of sample. Default is the basename of the input file.

inputSpec.name: outfile
inputSpec.help: Name of the output file. Default is [name].fp.
